definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: What I remember is that this town used to be a no-man place.
sentences.chinese: 我記得這個城市過去是個荒無人煙的地方。

sentences.english: When she was dropped off on an oblong island with no other inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 她在一個荒無人煙的長方形小島下了飛機。

sentences.english: On his way, Jada stopped for a night in a deserted place.
sentences.chinese: 在回家路上，加達在一處荒無人煙之地住了一夜。

sentences.english: No human habitation in the wetland, I use the truth to find your shadow.
sentences.chinese: 在這片荒無人煙的溼地，我用真情尋覓到了你的身影。

sentences.english: So it is a very desolate area.
sentences.chinese: 因此那是荒無人煙的地區。

sentences.english: It's in the middle of nowhere, basically.
sentences.chinese: 基本上是在一個荒無人煙的地方了。

definition: to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
lit. dragons and snakes mingle (idiom)/fig. a mix of good people and scumbags
to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
after the calamity, renewed life (idiom); new lease of life
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
like a swarm of bees/everyone swarms around pushing and shouting/a hornet's nest
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
